title: Would You Buy A Subaru BRZ Or A Lotus Elise? -- AFTER/DRIVE
description: #BRZorThat is back, and this time the Toyobaru squares off with the Lotus Elise, now going for around 30 grand in the used-car market. Which one would YOU buy? Vote now at http://slashdrive.tv/BRZorThat With AFTER/DRIVE producer Ian Whelan.
